properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
SENEGAL.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 15-31.9N 018-10.0W AT 220249Z JUL.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS AREA
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO
   IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER, PHONE: 603 2078 5763,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769, E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG,
   PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 300019Z JUL 17.
